title: UCIL Apprentice Training Online Form 2026
description: UCIL Apprentice Training Recruitment 2026 for Apply Online 364 Post Post Update Date: 21-02-2026 Short Description: Uranium Corporation of India Limited [UCIL] invites applications from Ex-ITI [NCVT], Diploma & Graduate candidates for various apprenticeship training under The Apprentices Act- 1961 read in conjunction with The Apprenticeship Rules 1992. A total number of 364 [Three Hundred Sixty Four] vacancies as per distribution of vacancy details given below Get the direct link to download ...
